info.description:
The Provider Directory API includes provider names, addresses, phone numbers, operation hour and specialties.This API consists of a collection of FHIR resources that align to DaVinci PDEX Plan Net implementation Guide based on HL7 FHIR v4.01:R4 specification. More information on each resource's response attributes may be found in the DaVinci PDEX Payer Network HL7 FHIR specification at the link below. 

[https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html)

Highmark Health provides data services for several health plans. Therefore, Highmark Health has implemented a multi-tenant FHIR server in which the data for each plan is in its own partition. Each partition is identified by a unique partition ID. 

The ***partitionId*** search parameter enables API user to retrieve provider data specific to its health plan network.

**Search Requests and Pagination**

When performing a search, a count parameter can be provided to control the number of resources returned in a single Bundle response. Please note that the maximum number of resources that can be returned in a single Bundle response is set to **500**. Pagination is supported via “first”, “previous”, “next” and “last” links as required in the core 
**[FHIR Paging specification.](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#paging)**
info.title: ProviderDirectory API

get.description:
A [Plannet-Organization](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Organization.html) is a formal or informal grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose, such as a company, institution, corporation, community group, or healthcare practice.

The `Plannet-Organization` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details.  

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed [Plannet-Organization](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Organization-definitions.html) and
[HL7 Bundle](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bundle.html) attribute descriptions.
Success response will be HL7 `Bundle` with `Organization` resource type of `Plannet-Organization`.

parameters.name: partof
parameters.description: Organization that are part of the specified organization

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Organization with the specified name

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Organization with the specified endpoint

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Organization with the specified address (matches any of the string elements of an address)

parameters.name: _include
parameters.description: Include other resource

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: A logical id of an Organization

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Last update date for Organization

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records

parameters.name: _revinclude
parameters.description: Include other resource that refers to this resource.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Organization of specified type

parameters.name: coverage-area
parameters.description: Organization within the provider network

parameters.name: type:text
parameters.description: Display vaue of type

parameters.name: name:exact
parameters.description: Searches for Organization with the exact specified name

parameters.name: name:contains
parameters.description: Select Organization with the specified name containing given search value at any position

parameters.name: address:exact
parameters.description: Display value of Organizations with the specified address (matches any of the string elements of an address)

parameters.name: address:contains
parameters.description: Organization with the specified address (matches any of the string elements of an address) containing given search value at any poistion

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Reverse chaining based on  properties of resources that refer to them

get.description:
A [Plannet-PractitionerRole](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-PractitionerRole.html) describes details about a provider, which can be a practitioner or an organization. When the provider is a practitioner, there may be a relationship to an organization. A provider renders services to patients at a location. When the provider is a practitioner, there may also be a relationship to an organization. Practitioner participation in healthcare provider insurance networks may be direct or through their role at an organization.

The `Plannet-PractitionerRole` FHIR [implementation Guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html)  contains complete details.

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed [Plannet-PractitionerRole](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-PractitionerRole-definitions.html) and [HL7 Bundle](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bundle.html) attribute descriptions.
Success response will be HL7 `Bundle` with `PractitionerRole` resource type of `Plannet-PractitionerRole`.

parameters.name: specialty
parameters.description: The practitioner has this specialty at an organization

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The practitioner can perform this role at for the organization

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organization

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the practitioner with this role

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The list of healthcare services that this worker provides for this role's Organization/Location(s)

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: One of the locations at which this practitioner provides care

parameters.name: _include
parameters.description: Include other resource

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: A member of the specified health insurance provider network

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: A logical id of the PractitionerRole

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Last update date for PractitionerRole

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records

parameters.name: specialty:text
parameters.description: Display value of specialty

parameters.name: role:text
parameters.description: Display value of role

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Reverse chaining based on  properties of resources that refer to them

get.description:
A [Plannet-Location](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Location.html) is the physical place where healthcare services are provided, practitioners are employed, organizations are based, etc. Locations can range in scope from a room in a building to a geographic region/area.

The `Plannet-Location` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details.  

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed [Plannet-Location](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Location-definitions.html) and [HL7 Bundle](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bundle.html) attribute descriptions.
Success response will be HL7 `Bundle` with `Location` resource type of `Plannet-Location`.

parameters.name: partof
parameters.description: A location of which this location is a part

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Searches for locations that are managed by the provided organization

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the location

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A (part of the) address of the location

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A code for the type of location

parameters.name: _include
parameters.description: Include other resource

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description: A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description: A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: A logical id of the Location

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Last update date for Location

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records

parameters.name: _revinclude
parameters.description: Include other resource that refers to this resource.

parameters.name: type:text
parameters.description: Display value of type

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Reverse chaining based on properties of resources that refer to them

parameters.name: address-postalcode:exact
parameters.description: Searches for exact postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: address:exact
parameters.description: Searches for exact address of the location

parameters.name: address:contains
parameters.description: A (part of the) address of the location containing given search value at any poistion

parameters.name: address-city:exact
parameters.description: Searches for exact city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-city:contains
parameters.description: A city specified in an address containing given search value at any poistion

parameters.name: address-state:exact

get.description:
A [Plannet-InsurancePlan](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-InsurancePlan.html) describes a health insurance offering comprised of a list of covered benefits (i.e. the product), costs associated with those benefits (i.e. the plan), and additional information about the offering, such as who it is owned and administered by, a coverage area, contact information, etc.

The `Plannet-InsurancePlan` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details.

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed [Plannet-InsurancePlan](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-InsurancePlan-definitions.html) and [HL7 Bundle](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/bundle.html) attribute descriptions. Success response will be HL7 `Bundle` with `InsurancePlan` resource type of `Plannet-InsurancePlan`.

parameters.name: administered-by
parameters.description: Products that are administered by the specified organization

parameters.name: owned-by
parameters.description: Products that are owned by the specified organization

parameters.name: coverage-area
parameters.description: Products that are offered in the specified location

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Products with the specified name

parameters.name: plan-type
parameters.description: Plans of the specified type

parameters.name: _include
parameters.description: Include other resource

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: A logical id of the InsurancePlan

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Last update date for InsurancePlan

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Products with the specified identifier

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of Insurance Plan

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of record

parameters.name: type:text
parameters.description: Display value of type

parameters.name: identifier:text
parameters.description: Text refer to a type parameter of the identifier

parameters.name: name:exact
parameters.description: Products with the specified name containing exact search value

parameters.name: name:contains
parameters.description: Products with the specified name containing given search value at any poistion

parameters.name: plan-type:text
parameters.description: Display value of plan-type

parameters.name: identifier:ofType
parameters.description: The system|code refer to a type parameter of the identifier

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Reverse chaining based on  properties of resources that refer to them

get.description:
A [Plannet-InsurancePlan](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-InsurancePlan.html) describes a health insurance offering comprised of a list of covered benefits (i.e. the product), costs associated with those benefits (i.e. the plan), and additional information about the offering, such as who it is owned and administered by, a coverage area, contact information, etc.

The `Plannet-InsurancePlan` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details.

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed `Plannet-InsurancePlan` [attribute descriptions](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-InsurancePlan-definitions.html) and [sample response](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/InsurancePlan-AcmeQHPBronze.json.html).

get.description:
The [Plannet-HealthCareService](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-HealthcareService.html) resource typically describes services offered by an organization/practitioner at a location. The resource may be used to encompass a variety of services covering 
the entire healthcare spectrum, including promotion, prevention, diagnostics, hospital and ambulatory care, home care, long-term care and other health-related and community services.

The `Plannet-HealthCareService` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details.


Reference the FHIR specification for detailed `Plannet-HealthCareService` [attribute descriptions](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-HealthcareService-definitions.html) and [sample response](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/HealthcareService-BurrClinicServices.json.html).

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: healthCareServiceId
parameters.description: Id of the Plannet-HealthCareService

get.description:
The technical details of [Plannet-Endpoint](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Endpoint.html) can be used for electronic services, such as a portal or FHIR REST services, messaging or operations, or DIRECT messaging.

The `Plannet-Endpoint` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details.

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed `Plannet-Endpoint` [attribute descriptions](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Endpoint-definitions.html) and [sample response](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/Endpoint-AcmeOfCTPortalEndpoint.json.html).

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: Id of the Plannet-Endpoint

get.description:
The [Plannet-OrganizationAffiliation](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-OrganizationAffiliation.html) resource describes relationships between two or more organizations, including the services one organization provides another, the location(s) where they provide services, the availability of those services, electronic endpoints, and other relevant information.

The `Plannet-OrganizationAffiliation` FHIR [implementation guide](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/index.html) contains complete details. 

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed Plannet-OrganizationAffiliation [attribute descriptions](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-OrganizationAffiliation-definitions.html) and [sample response](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/OrganizationAffiliation-BurrClinicAffil.json.html).

parameters.name: partitionId
parameters.description: Partition ID of health plan

parameters.name: organizationAffiliationId
parameters.description: Id of the Plannet-OrganizationAffiliation

Reference the FHIR specification for detailed `Plannet-Practitioner` [attribute descriptions](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/StructureDefinition-plannet-Practitioner-definitions.html) and [sample response](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/STU1/Practitioner-HansSolo.json.html).
